title: Spider-man: the new animated series
creator_credit: Various, Mainframe Entertainment and Adelaide Productions
brief_description: Modernised, highly amusing and very cool animated series about Spider-man, aka Peter Parker, focusing on his college years, as he tries to study, make sense of his love life, earn a living and keep the streets crime-free as a super-hero. This is the entire first series and the episodes include: Heroes and villians; Royal scam; Law of the jungle; Sword of Shikata; Keeping secrets; Tight squeeze; Head over heels; The Party; Flash memory; Spider-man disabled; When sparks fly; Mind Games Part 1 & 2. This is the first completely computer generated “Spider-man” and features the voices of Neil Patrick Harris, Lisa Loeb, and Ian Ziering. Based on the Marvel comic book character created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko.
